INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Orbital images are source of data for indirect quantification of water to agriculture. It?s made from
mapping the irrigated and water allotment. This methodology is normally developed by Image
Classification. Therefore, the algorithms only analyse the difference between endmembers spectral. In
Algarve region in Portugal predominant is the small farming. Thus, the identification of the irrigated area
is compromised when utilized the Classification because the pixel has many elements number inserted in
unique pixel, that result in spectral mixture the reflectance of the endmembers. For modelling the mixture
endmembers applied the Multiple Endmember Spectral Mixture Analysis by fraction image. This work is
developed for citrus, which is the more important crop. The results show that the irrigated area aren?t
exceed 2,14 kmІ in a total area of 65,08 kmІ. To check these results are executed a similar methodology
by analysing the golf camp, that the water consumes its known. Thus, identify area of 18,49 kmІ (Golf)
and consume of 77,28 millions de m3/year.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The aim of this paper is to present a spatial analysis of degraded areas in Ji-Parana city, inserted in Rondonia state, based on orbital remote sensing data integrated with a Geographic Information System (GIS). The specific goal was to characterize the impacts associated with major streams, including permanent preservation areas and remaining of the urban forest (Buritizais). The survey was conducted into the Project "Teaching of science and technology transfer as an experience of environmental education in micro basins of the Ji-Paranб/RO River" with specialization in the recognition of the environmental situation, focusing on the soil use and occupation, on the micro basin of the Ji-Parana River. The methodology included the merger of CBERS-2B, CCD sensors and HRC. The results revealed that the fusion of images freely available satellite data is highly recommended for analysis in urban centers.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The study aims to draw attention to loss of vegetation along watercourses by planting of cane sugar in the municipality of Santa Helena de Goiбs, which should be maintained by the role it plays in maintaining the biodiversity of terrestrial and water, improving the health and quality of life of citizens. Based on data from the municipality of Santa Helena de Goiбs, in the period 2005 to 2007, the study aims to identify, define, quantify and analyze the Permanent Preservation Areas - APP who had their native vegetation removed to make way for occupancy terminations by sugarcane sugar. Using Arcgis software and Envi, we identified the areas being occupied by this culture, where they were generated buffers of 30 meters, whereas a marginal band of 30 meters for water courses with up to 10 feet wide and 100 meters to the rivers that have between 50 and 100 meters wide, which were made descriptions of the scenario analysis. After this procedure was performed at the intersection of the areas of APP with the sites for planting sugar cane in order to verify the occupation of cane sugar in PPA areas. Subsequently, calculations were made of areas for each year in order to know what was the increase of cultivation of sugarcane in APP. It was concluded that the advance of this crop is not in compliance with the APP.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: With the development of the country and the growing demand for electricity, the installation of small hydropower (SHP) has spread in recent decades. However, the implementation of these projects is followed by numerous impacts on the environment. The identification of these impacts is essential to support the implementation of a management plan that aims to mitigate these impacts proposing alternatives to assist in the regeneration of the area affected by the implementation of the project. In this sense, this study aimed to identify the physical changes resulting from the implementation of SHP Angelo Cassol installed in the municipality of Alta Floresta D?Oeste - Rondфnia. For this purpose, we used satellite images LANDSAT 5 TM sensor, and remote sensing techniques such as segmentation and image classification, implemented in software SPRING 5.1.8. The analyzes revealed that after the implementation of SHP was a decrease in the native area, due to the removal of vegetation to form to the reservoir, and changes in grazing areas and exposed soil. Based on the results, it was found that the methodology proved to be adequate to analysis, showing that these techniques are effective and can be considered the first approximation in more detailed studies of the physical environment.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The development of brazilian cities is the result of intensive flow of investments in both private and public sector. To this end, these investments affect directly the environment, society and the economic sector in a positive way, like the installation of water and sewer drainage network, and also in a negative way, such as the marginalization of society, the high unemployed index and the environmental impacts. So, it were used satellite images, from Landsat 5TM, to check urban sprawl on the vegetation from Porto Velho, RO in the period 2001 to 2011 emphasizing the rate of green areas and its interference in the city?s environmental quality. For this it were used the NDVI calculation, which highlights the photosynthetically active vegetation and subsequent classification of the images. After images classification it was noticed a considerable visual variation about the vegetation reduction in the city, with more emphasis in its south and central area.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The implementation process of the Socio-Economic Ecological Zoning ?ZSEE in Rondфnia State, regarded as an environmental management tool, aimed to discipline the occupation of the territory urban and rural allied with economic and environmental purposes, taking into consideration the various forms used colonization projects in the state did not deliberate in-depth studies on the ground use and occupation. In this context, the article analyzes the inconsistencies contained in ZSEE, as well as disrespect to their limits, in Sгo Miguel do Guaporй, located in the State of Rondфnia. To make this possible were used remote sensing satellite data, which were georeferenced with the aid of the Spring software. For this purpose, were used multispectral images obtained by Thematic Mapper ? Landsat 5 TM. Thus, it was possible to know the morphological sites and thus contrast the ZSEE municipality with data literature and federal laws as the CONAMA303, making it possible to identify rough areas busy being wrongly aimed at intense occupation and sites classified area conservation of natural resources and Indigenous Lands illegally invaded for agropastoral use, consequently evidencing the failures and breaches of ZSEE prepared by the state

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The biological reserves aims the full preservation of biota and other natural attributes existing within 
its boundaries. In this sense, the present work intends to demonstrate the occupation and conservation of the 
Jaru?s biological reserve through remote sensing tools, using orbital images of different periods from LANDSAT 
satellite. It were used images of five distinct periods: 1973, 1984, 1991, 2001 and 2011 years, which enabled the
generation of graphs and maps, together, allowing visualization of vegetation dynamics.When working with 
images of different periods it is possible to define and calculate the deforestation accomplished in these periods, 
setting the rate of expansion and the likely environmental impacts. The evolution of the removal of vegetation
between 2001 and 2010 is worrying, considering that area is supposed to be preserved. Deforestation affects the 
reservation including the riparian forest, without any planning towards the future especially for preservation of
the natural environment causing a lot of impacts on biodiversity and changing biotic. In addition to area studies, 
for the protection of reserves, it is necessary awareness activities and public policies, expansion of surveillance 
and effective actions of the competent bodies as ICMBio, IBAMA, SEDAM, and also joint actions of 
nongovernmental organizations (NGOs) and associations

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Tradicionalmente a densidade demogrбfica й obtida pela razгo do nъmero de 
habitantes pela extensгo territorial de todo o universo, espacializando-os em mapas 
coroplйticos. A desvantagem do mйtodo coroplйtico й que o nъmero de pessoas й distribuнdo 
em бreas que nгo sгo habitadas, tais essas como campos, rios, бreas agrнcolas e outras. A 
dasimetria tem por finalidade corrigir essa suavizaзгo, atravйs de dados integrados. A face

Estado de Rondфnia, a partir do processamento de imagens orbitais de sensoriamento remoto

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O trabalho apresenta os resultados de uma experiкncia pedagуgica em geotecnologias com os estudantes do curso de Bacharelado em Engenharia Ambiental da UNIR. Revela ainda uma pesquisa de satisfaзгo dos discentes diante dos trabalhos realizados. Tal experiкncia se materializou atravйs da estruturaзгo de recursos audiovisuais na бrea de geotecnologias. Assim, para sondagem de satisfaзгo aplicou-se um questionбrio com questхes abertas e fechadas. Em sнntese, os resultados revelaram que 90% dos inquiridos afirmaram que os vнdeos os ajudaram na aprendizagem e 74,6% revelaram que aprenderam mais com os vнdeos e que os mesmos contribuem para reflexгo teуrico-prбtico em geotecnologias. Contudo, 65,3% sugeriram melhorias para a estruturaзгo de novos vнdeos.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
A Lei 9.433/1997 define a bacia hidrogrбfica como unidade de planejamento territorial,
sendo o conhecimento de suas informaзхes necessбrio а tomada de decisхes. O presente
estudo teve como objetivo proceder а caracterizaзгo morfomйtrica das bacias
hidrogrбficas que integram o perнmetro urbano do municнpio de Ji-Paranб/RO,
localizado na Amazфnia Ocidental, utilizando-se para isso de ferramentas de
Geoprocessamento e Sensoriamento Remoto. A бrea de estudo compreendeu 14 bacias
hidrogrбficas, sendo verificado que oito delas apresentaram um formato alongado,
tendendo ao retangular, o que indica baixa possibilidade de picos de enchentes. As seis
bacias restantes apresentaram uma transiзгo entre o formato retangular e circular,
indicando maior potencialidade de picos de enchente elevados

A pecuбria й atividade econфmica que mais influencia a conversгo das 
paisagens naturai
s na Amazфnia Ocidental, especialmente em Rondфnia. Isso ocorre

ara dar lugar 
a gramнnea exуtica

como objetivo realizar uma
estatнstica espacial exploratуria da pecuarizaзгo em

Estatнstica (IBGE) e correlacionб
-
los com os dados de retirada da vegetaзгo, 
disponibilizados pelo Instituto Nacion

-

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O estudo em questгo tem como
objetivo analisar, sob a уtica da bacia 
hidrogrбfica, como instrumento de gestгo e planejamento ambiental, a бrea drenada

de imagens de sensoriamento remoto orbital manipulado, num Sistema de

florestas e
savan

respectivamente. A бrea ocupada por

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
A distribuiзгo espacial da cobertura vegetal em бreas urbanas demonstra aspectos
relacionados а qualidade socioambiental, importantes para um bom planejamento urbano
das cidades. Neste trabalho realizou-se uma anбlise multitemporal da cobertura vegetal,
utilizando-se imagens de sensores orbitais, entre os anos de 1990 a 2015, para o municнpio
de Senador Canedo, estado de Goiбs, Brasil. O processamento das imagens de satйlite e a
confecзгo dos mapas ocorreram no software ArcGis 9.2. Foram utilizadas imagens orbitais
dos anos 1990, 1995, 2000, 2005, 2010 e 2015 dos Satйlites Landsat 5 (TM) e 8 (OLI). As
imagens foram processadas e classificadas por tйcnica de mбxima verossimilhanзa para
duas classes: vegetaзгo remanescente e бreas convertidas (uso agrнcola e urbano). Apуs
essa etapa, foram quantificados por mйtodo de sobreposiзгo de camadas os desmatamentos
das бreas de remanescente do bioma Cerrado para as classes urbana e rural, relativas а бrea
de pesquisa. Os mapas resultantes permitiram uma anбlise multitemporal comparativa das
taxas de desmatamento urbano e rural, com vistas а adoзгo de medidas de recuperaзгo da
vegetaзгo nativa.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O presente estudo identifica e caracteriza os espaзos de compra na cidade de Goiвnia a partir da integraзгo de Geotecnologias, Sistema de Informaзгo Geogrбfica, Sensoriamento Remoto e Cartografia Computadorizada. Os espaзos de compras sгo caracterizados como os lugares dentro da cidade onde o turista tem а sua disposiзгo, especialmente o comйrcio de confecзхes de roupas. A partir do mapeamento foi possнvel estabelecer a localizaзгo precisa de feiras, shoppings e avenidas. Esta localizaзгo permitiu criar roteiros de compra para facilitar a circulaзгo do turista na cidade de Goiвnia.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This study identifies and characterizes the shopping areas in the city of Goiвnia through the integration of Geotechnologies, Geographic Information System, Remote Sensing and Computer Cartography. The shopping areas are characterized as places within the city where tourists have supplies available, especially regarding the trade of clothes. The mapping showed the precise location of street markets, shopping malls as well as avenues and it enabled the creation of shopping roadmaps to facilitate the flow of tourists around the city.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Geospatial data and information for the Territorial and Environmental Analyses in Amazфnia Legal region - Brazil

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: SANTOS, A. M. D.;SANTOS, ALEX MOTA DOS;SANTOS, ALEX;MOTA DOS SANTOS, ALEX;SANTOS, ALEX DA MOTA;DOS SANTOS, ALEX MOTA

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Territorial and environmental analyses in Brazil receive rich contributions of geospatial data and information that are distributed by various local, state and federal agencies as well as private companies, non-governmental organizations and universities. Producers of geospatial data provide information on various topics such as land use, census, and indigenous lands, among others. However, the availability of this kind of data in Brazil is heterogenous in quantity, variety and quality. In the Brazilian Amazon the acquisition and sharing of geospatial data are compromised. The databases of this region are poorly disseminated. The data availability is precarious and the update of existing data is uncertain. Indeed, users of geospatial data, whether public or private, become disadvantaged. This article discusses the scenario of geospatial databases from the Brazilian Amazon and suggests a reflection about the benefits of Spatial Data Infrastructures for the region.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Impacto da colonizaзгo na Zona da Mata Rondoniense, Amazфnia Ocidental-Brasil
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Impact of colonization in the Forest Zone Rondoniense, Western Amazon-Brazil

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: SANTOS, A. M. D.;SANTOS, ALEX MOTA DOS;SANTOS, ALEX;MOTA DOS SANTOS, ALEX;SANTOS, ALEX DA MOTA;DOS SANTOS, ALEX MOTA

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The objective of this work is to demonstrate the impact caused by colonization, between 1985 and 2011, in the Forest Zone Rondoniense (ZMR), Western Amazon, Brazil. We used Landsat 5 satellite images to quantify areas of major ground covers (forest, disturbed areas, savannah and grassland and water). In 26 years, the ZMR was submitted to a deforestation of 38,4 % of the forest area, and 27,9 % of the savannah and grassland. The counties that had higher rates of deforestation in the areas of forest, savannah and grassland were Rolim de Moura (81,6 %) and Alta Floresta D?Oeste (46,3 %). Alto Alegre dos Parecis and Alta Floresta D?Oeste, hold from 83,9 % to 95,0 % of the water area of the ZMR.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: CHOQUES DE TERRITORIALIDADES NAS TERRAS INDНGENAS DE GOIБS

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A localizaзгo e o tamanho das terras indнgenas no paнs revelam como a ocupaзгo se consolidou, de leste para oeste. Nesse contexto, o Estado de Goiбs, de ocupaзгo consolidada e na porзгo centro-leste do paнs, demarcou apenas 0,12% do seu territуrio para os povos indнgenas. Com efeito, as demarcaзхes nгo respeitaram os territуrios tradicionais devido аs pressхes diversas pela crescente incorporaзгo das бreas do estado aos desнgnios do capital. Diante desse cenбrio, o objetivo desse trabalho foi realizar anбlises das territorialidades nas terras indнgenas localizadas no Estado de Goiбs e em seu entorno. A metodologia envolveu anбlises por mйtodos indiretos, especificamente imagens orbitais de sensoriamento remoto, em um sistema de informaзгo geogrбfica. Em sнntese, os resultados constataram que todas as terras indнgenas em Goiбs apresentam choques de territorialidades, especialmente com o agronegуcio, produзгo de energia e turismo.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: O uso de programas de geoprocessamento na de-terminaзгo de impactos gerados pela mineraзгo na Amazфnia
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: The use of GIS programs in determining impacts caused by mining in the Amazon

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Revista Internacional de Tecnologнa, Ciencia y Sociedad

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Mining is an essential activity for the nation, mainly due to the generation of jobs and income. However, it generates various impacts that vary according to the particularities of mining as well as the type of ore. Therefore, this study aimed to characterize the mining projects near or in protected areas in the State of Rondonia. They used data mining processes that have shown a high interest in minerals such as cassiterite and gold. Through GIS, it was observed that the Rondonia Protected Areas are about diverse interests who continually offer great pressures on UC?s. Such pressures in often occur illegally, demonstrating the importance of actions to ensure the conservation of natural resources.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Conflitos territoriais no Corredor Etnoambiental Tupi-Mondй - Rondфnia-Mato Grosso
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Territorial Conflicts in the Ethnoenvironmental Corridor TupiMondй - Rondфnia and Mato Grosso States/Brazil

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The consolidation of the occupation in Brazil resulted in territorial
conflicts, bringing by the resistance from indigenous peoples who claimed the land
demarcations, which in some cases has given rise to the ethno-environmental corridors.
Thus, this observation, this study aimed to analyze the territorial conflicts in ethnoenvironmental
corridor Tupi-Mondй, in Rondфnia and Mato Grosso States of Brazil. The methodology included indirect methods, of which the remote sensing image
analysis. For management practices, training and renewing pastures it was found the
use of fire. In addition, it was observed that Ethno-environmental Corridor has been
disconnected in the western portion, between Indigenous Land Igarapй Lourdes, and
Sete de Setembro.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Densidade demogrбfica: um estudo comparativo de duas metodologias a partir de imagens orbital e suborbital na cidade de Aparecida de Goiвnia/Goiбs
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Demographic density: a comparative study of two methodologies from orbital and suborbital images in the Aparecida de Goiвnia City / Goiбs State

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Danielly Cristina de Souza Costa Holmes

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Demographic density mapping is recurrent, serve to the planning and implementation of civil works, assists in estimating transport demands, in the indentification of areas to education and heath premise establishments. However, density is normally calculated by Coropletic Method, wich give the impession of that population are homogeneously distributed in each unit of area, in that case the census tratus, even when parts of region are, in fact, inhabited. Thus, the objective of this work was to apply the dasimetric method, from two different remote sensing products manipulated in a GIS. Results showed that the density is directly related to the type of image used. Mapping from aerial photographs revealed more detailed urban areas, and, therefore more realistic demographic densities. Besides that, non-homogeneous densities were identified in the urban space of the city of Aparecida de Goiвnia, in which only 14.81% of the area of the urban sectors actually have an urban area and 20.47% of the areas of the neighborhoods are actually occupied.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Anбlise espacial dos usos e da cobertura da terra no pantanal dos rios Guaporй e Mamorй/Rondфnia
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Spatial analysis of the uses and land cover in the wetland of Guaporй and Mamorй rivers/Rondфnia - Brazil

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article aims to present a spatial analysis of land use and land cover in the wetland of Guaporй and Mamore rivers in the state of Rondфnia. This area is considered wetlands, lacking in studies on the uses that occur in this region, it has a rich bio-social diversity that are threatened, as part of its area is within the southern portion, which is expanding area of the State new agricultural frontier. Thus, to achieve the goals it was applied digital image processing in geography information system. The results revealed that 4.74% of the study area is occupied by agricultural activities and 0.07% by fire. Also it was observed that 55.87% of this was occupied by institutional areas, indigenous lands, integral conservation units and indirect use. The Alluvial Rain Forest is the most frequent land cover, occupies an area of 7979.84, which corresponds to 47.17% of the area under study. Therefore, to identify uses in special areas was possible to state conflicts of use of the area under study.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Cartografias possнveis: um olhar sobre os mapas mentais indнgenas em Rondфnia, Brasil
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Possible cartographies: a look on indigenous mental maps in Rondфnia State, Brazil

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Maps are with no doubts the most accepted and disseminated resource for spatial representation. However, their acceptance is only complete when prepared under the rigors of a cartography method. Also, others cartographies are possible from participatory mapping. Thus, from this possibility the purpose of this analysis is to reveal other cartographies from indigenous mental maps and to indicate its use in the teaching and learning process. The methodology included the case study, in loco observation, comparison and empirical analysis and used the Kozel Methodology for the study of mental maps. The results revealed the potential in learning and recognition of the conflicts, the territory claim, family relationships, study of the physical environment, environmental impacts on indigenous lands and on animals and vegetation.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: 'The University goes to School': Reports of an Experience of University Extension Cartography
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: 'THE UNIVERSITY GOES TO SCHOOL': REPORTS OF AN EXPERIENCE OF UNIVERSITY EXTENSION IN CARTOGRAPHY

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: We defend that one of extension's premises are "take away the university" further its walls, so that pick up the "extern" knowledge and instate it to the university knowledge made. Therefore, this paper relate an experience of extension's acitivities in the children's cartography area that attend the senior 5th in Aparecida de Goiвnia municipal school - Goiбs. Methodology covered the achievement of fieldwork, digital cartography workshop and selfmap. Outcome revealed the capacity that student has to selfmap and handle digital tools to elaborate maps and variated themes. Elaborated mindmaps revealed the student places, but places dreams also. Fieldwork afforded student's interation with the environment, organized form, designed and headed, so that encourage them to operate in the themself knowledge building.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: VULNERABILIDADE NATURAL А PERDA DE SOLOS NA FLONA BOM FUTURO E SEU ENTORNO PRУXIMO/ESTADO DE RONDФNIA
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: VULNERABILIDADE NATURAL А PERDA DE SOLOS NA FLONA BOM FUTURO E SEU ENTORNO PRУXIMO/ESTADO DE RONDФNIA

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The National Forest (FLONA) of the Bom Futuro, placed in Porto Velho county, Rondonia state, Brazil, suffered an occupation since 1990. Indeed, it is possible that occupation in FLONA area had been affected the soil stability, letting it susceptible to erosion. In this sense, the goals from that work had to measure and quantify the natural vunerability to the soils?s loss in the FLORA ? Bom Futuro and its surround from indirect methods, namely, the digital processing of remote sensing and algebra of maps from the Geographic Information Systems (GIS). How result indentified that the withdrawal of native vegetation may interfere in ground stability, being the damage minimized by soil structure and the geology found in the area. Besides that, it was observed that was indigenous land the special area that more contributed to forest conservation.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The removal of vegetation in many areas from Brazil reduced the Etnoambiental corridors. Such identified dynamics in Rondфnia State, in Amazon Region, eliminated the connectivity among indigenous lands. Therefore, that paper aims to propose the delimitation of one area to the installation of an ecological corridor between Rio Omerк and Tanaru Indigenous Lands located in the southern portion from Rondфnia State - Brazil. To reach the objectives applied the terrestrial events modeling of a Geographic Information System (GIS) from the weighting of use and occupation variable, permanent preservation бrea and slope. Results revealed eight proposals for ecological corridors, in which the D corridor showed a lower percentage of anthropic areas, 28,40% and the higher percentage of forest area, 71,61%. Besides, it was found that the length of that corridor was about 25 km, width 2.5 km and occupied 61.84kmІ of area.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Intensidade dos Processos Antropogкnicos no Entorno do Reservatуrio do Ribeirгo Joгo Leite - Goiбs - Brasil
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Intensity of the Anthropogenic Processes Around the Ribeirгo Joгo Leite Reservoir ? Goiбs ? Brazil

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The Ribeirгo Joгo Leite reservoir occupies part of municipalities of Goiвnia, Nerуpolis, Goianбpolis and Teresуpolis de Goiбs areas. Its objective is the public water supply of Goiвnia and large portion of your metropolitan region municipalities (MRM), foreseen until the year of 2025. Although your importance, the reservoir suffers several pressures of interests of multiple uses in your surroundings, which can compromise your life, on question of the quality and quantity of water for public supply. In this sense, the present article aims to map and identify the activities of land use and cover around the Ribeirгo Joгo Leite reservoir, from the perspective of evaluating your level of anthropic pressure. For such was made use of Digital Image Processing (IDP) techniques and GIS modeling. The results show that despite the presence of protected areas, like the Ecological Park Altamiro Moura Pacheco and State Park of Joгo Leite, assist in containing the pressures surrounding the reservoir, 42,20% of your area presents considered degrading activities. Counting with the presence of an open air garbage deposit near him. Besides that, the conditions of the water courses that supply the reservoir are concerned too, with water sources already committed and conflicting situations in Permanent Preservation Areas (PPA).

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The object this work was to analyze the socioenvironmental impacts, in all indigenous lands occupied in all Rondфnia State/Brazil, in the South of the Brazilian Amazon. Thus, the indirect method of analysis was used to evaluate the environmental impacts and the literature review to map the social impacts. The threat's scenarios reveal distinct in the 21 indigenous lands, that, in general, it has been observed that indigenous lands of access easy suffer intense pressure, in highlights illegal wood extraction, landlord threat, threat about water resources, on the soils, gold-digging, burned forests and pastures, threat about the right to come and go of remaining communities.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: NATURAL VULNERABILITY THE LOSS OF SOILS ANALYSIS IN THE ALTO ALEGRE DOS PARECIS/RONDФNIA STATE AND ITS IMPACT ON THE RIO MEQUЙNS INDIGENOUS LAND

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The stability of the physical environment around of the indigenous lands of Rondфnia is troubled by the occupation process encouraged by the National State of Amazonia. The objective of the research was to evaluate natural vulnerability in soil loss in Alto Alegre dos Parecis, south of Rondфnia, where the totality of the Rio Mequйns indigenous land is located. A geographic modeling of the Geographic Information System (GIS) was used to reach the purpose objectives. The results revealed that the soil loss favored the formation of ravines and sand in higher areas. Thus, the particulate material that is released can reach the watercourses within the indigenous land, which makes it impossible to navigate during periods of drought and affects the ichthyofauna, which is part of the diet of indigenous peoples.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In Brazil, especially in the State of Rondфnia, the occupation of territory, driven by programs of the federal government in the 70's, has resulted in the degradation of natural resources. With this, the State Government created environmental protection areas. From such finding, the work aimed to characterize the occupation of physical environment of the Corumbiara State Park, as well as their buffer zone in three distinct periods. For this, it was used remote sensing images of years 1990, 2000, 2014 and 2017, which were handled in Geographic Information Systems (GIS), where techniques of digital image processing were employed. The results revealed vegetation changes during the analyzed period and indicated consolidation of the anthropic area, from 5,814 hectares in 1990 to 22,796 in 2017, at a growth rate of 74.49% and the factor was the reduction of the park area in 2002. The results revealed vegetation changes during the analyzed period and indicated consolidation of the anthropic area, from 5.814 hectares, in the year 1990 to 22.796, in the year 2017, at a growth rate of 74.49% and the determining factor for such growth was the reduction of the park area in the year 2002.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Experiкncias de Extensгo Universitбria na бrea de arborizaзгo da Universidade Federal de Goiбs
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Experiкncias de Extensгo Universitбria na бrea de arborizaзгo da Universidade Federal de Goiбs

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This work presents an overview of the main results of university extension experiences in the afforestation field of the new campus of the Federal University of Goiбs (UFG) in Aparecida de Goiвnia. The methodology has covered a thematic mapping elaboration, work dissemination to society and a survey, through an online questionnaire about the importance of urban vegetation to the university community, students and teachers, and external community. The results have revealed that the extension actions facilitated the activities dissemination of the UFG, encouraged the communication between the external community, and allowed to understand its perception about the topic under analysis. Thus, most of the respondents (98.3%) considers urban vegetation as something essential for the human life, and mainly, for a more pleasant climate and greater well-being. Moreover, 94.1% of the external community is interested to participate in projects that encourage the planting of trees in urban environments.

Work brings a pedagogical experience from the university extension to the education in the traffic
in a primary and secondary school in the city of Goiвnia. Methodology has included workshops
on cartography and field work. Results has revealed that students engage in a hands-on way
with practical activities, including when they are required to work with technological tools. In
addition, it was observed that students present deep knowledge about the traffic, because in the

behaviors of their parents, relatives or acquaintances. Knowledge was been produced through
the map was applied in teaching in several disciplines, for example, Portuguese language, from

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: MULTITEMPORAL ANALYSIS OF USES AND SOIL COVERAGE IN THE INDIGENOUS LANDS DEMARCATED IN GOIБS STATE

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Multi temporal analyzes of covered and land use help in the comprehension of an area occupation dynamic. Like that, the paper describe the changes of physical environmental of indigenous lands and their surroundings near in Goias. To achieve the objective was used the digital processing of remote sensing images of four different periods (before the creation of indigenous lands and the current period), field analysis, data from the outbreaks of available fire by INPE and census data of the population and agriculture. The results revealed significant changes in land cover and land use over the period analyzed. In summary, it was observed that in the area of the indigenous land Avб-Canoeiro was mapped area of flood and fires. In the areas surrounding the Karajб, Aruanг I and III indigenous lands, the expansion of the urban perimete of Aruanг and advancement of the agricultural areas in substitution for the savannas stands out. Finally, in the Carretгo I and II indigenous land and its surroundings, agriculture and cattle ranching predominated, being that the conversion data of the landscape in this area are associated to the growth of the number of cattle, which demands greater pasture area and therefore greater conversion of landscapes.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: REFLECTIONS ON THE POPULATION DYNAMICS PAITER SURUН OF RONDФNIA

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The purpose of this article is to discuss the demographic dynamics of the Paiter
Suruн people of the north-western Brazilian state of Rondфnia. Accordingly, we have used
bibliographical data and maps in order to show the spatialization of the results. The results
reveal that, as with most indigenous peoples in Brazil, this population had been growing, with
high rates of fertility, but in the initial years of contact with the outside world, growth rates
crashed due to epidemics and violent conflict. Currently, they live in the Sete de Setembro
indigenous reserve and they provide spatial protection for the reserve.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The objective of the study was to determine the percentage of green areas in the Northern, Northwestern, and Meia Ponte zones of the city of Goiвnia-Goiбs, Brazil. The Green Area Index (gai) was applied, in conformity with the methodological principles used by indicators that depend on demographics, expressed by the ratio of green area surfaces per inhabitant. The gai was quantified by interpreting remote sensing images to draw the vegetation cover map, and dasymetric mapping was used for demographic density. Results made it possible to evaluate the relation among spatial distribution of the gai, population quantity, and urban environmental quality. It has been observed an unbalanced correlation between the quantitative-qualitative levels of green areas, which are subordinate to its greenery maintenance and real estate speculation.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: ANALYSIS OF DISMANTLING IN BR-421 AREAS OF INFLUENCEAND PRESSURES ON SPECIAL AREAS IN WEST OF RONDФNIA/STATE

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Objectiveof the research is to analyze the main anthropogenic changes in the areas of influence of the BR-421 highway and the pressures on the physical environment in part of the specialareas of the indigenous land type located in the west of Rondфnia. Indirect methods of landscape analysis were used, namely the digital image processing and the calculation of an anthropic pressure index. In addition to the use of indirect methods, a questionnaire was used to evaluate the perception of indigenous students residing in one of the lands found in the areas of influence of federal highway BR-421. Resultshadshowed that deforestation was consolidated in the year 2000 through the implementation of federal highway BR-421 and the conversion of the landscape was revealed by the agricultural sector, which grew by 547.82% in the period of analysis. Finally, of the three areas under federal highway BR-421, the Direct Influence Area (DIA) was the one with the highest growth rate of forest conversion in agricultural areas, 543.58%.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: The denouncementthrough Cartography: Threats to Indigenous Lands in Rondфnia/Brazil

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The implementation of policies for economic growth of the Amazon Region and the lack of oversight of anthropic activities have affected and continue to affect rights acquired by indigenous communities through various threats to indigenous lands. In the RondфniaState, the threats are mapped by the communities themselves and from data and geographic information freely available from state agencies. Thus, the objective of this paper is to present and discuss the denouncement through cartography treats to the Indigenous Lands in RondфniaState. The methodology involves the cartographic representation of indigenous peoplesand Cartesian cartography. The maps of indigenous peoples revealed that the main threats relate to enterprises for the production of electricity through the implementation of generators of various sizes, the focus of burning, the removal of wood, agriculture and livestock. Cartesian maps corroborate these analyzes and reveal a scenario for the entire Amazon.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The analysis of the dynamics of changes in patterns of land use and occupation, which is essential for the planning of urban areas, can be done indirectly through remote sensing orbital images. Orbital images have proven to be important tools for measuring and monitoring human activities on Earth. Thus, this paper aims to map the surrounding areas of Passeio das Бguas Shopping Center, located in the northern region of Goiвnia, Brazil, assigning to it the condition of Travel Generator (TG). Hence, this study analysed the dynamics of change in land use and cover in its surroundings. The methodology used was based on the digital processing of orbital images in a Geographic Information System (GIS) environment. The results showed that, in a 10-year interval, there was a reduction of the vegetation area, and a significant increase in the paved and built areas, promoting significant changes in the land use pattern after the implementation of the TG.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Spatial analysis of traffic accidents is fundamental to comprehend and recognize critical points of road sections and hence establish strategies to reduce these occurrences. This study aims to conduct the spatial analysis of the traffic accidents in 2016 at federal highway sections of the state of Goiбs, Brazil. The geocoding was performed in a Geographic Information System (GIS) and mapping of the accident data was provided by NURAM/PRF/GO. Kernel?s density estimation method was applied to analyze the spatial variability and was correlated with data of: fleet, number of cars and engine rate. The results revealed that BR-060, specifically between Goiвnia and Distrito Federal, and BR-153, which are the areas that not only present the highest density of traffic accidents, but also a high density of the most severe accidents, with cases of death. Despite being under concession and having the best conditions of traffic and inspection by mobile and fixed equipment, these road sections are configured as critical points. Finally, there was no evidence that the fleet, the number of light vehicles or the motorization rate explain the occurrences of accidents in the federal highways of Goiбs, in the year analyzed.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The construction and expansion of highways aiming to improve the integration of the most isolated regions in Brazil facilitated the access to many inhabited areas in the Amazon biome, but had as a consequence assisted the degradation of many of these regions. Over the last two decades, we have observed in this biome a gradual diversification and intensification of land uses through vegetation loss and an increase in fire associated with deforestation and an increase in grazing areas. We used data from several active fires products derived from 14 different satellites, available on the Brazilian National Institute for Space Research (INPE). We evaluated the influence of highway infrastructure on fire occurrence inside and around Indigenous Lands (IL) located in the Brazilian Amazon biome, from 2008 to 2021. We classified 332 ILs into ?cut by highways?, ?without highways?, and ?with highways in a 10 km buffer?. We performed: (a) the descriptive statistics of the fire occurrence by state, by season, and by type of land use and land cover (LULC) affected by fire; (b) the spatial distribution of the active fire density; and (c) a simple linear regression model between the fire occurrence and the IL area. Our results showed that in total, 16?46% of the fires occurred within the IL in most of the states, while the 10 km buffer was the region most affected by fire. We confirmed that in the last three years there was a significant increase in the number of active fires, representing anomalies in fire occurrence across the studied period. We discussed the result implications and the role of the highway network in environmental degradation inside and around the ILs located in the Brazilian Amazon.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
La agricultura intensiva, practicada normalmente a partir del sistema de
irrigaciуn, como actividad econуmica de gran importancia para la
producciуn de alimentos, es uno de los mayores consumidores del agua
en varias partes del mundo y normalmente se utilizan aguas
subterrбneas o de grandes represas para la irrigaciуn. Mientras tanto, el
conocimiento del consumo es dificultoso ya que es difнcil la instalaciуn
y la monitorizaciуn de medidores en cada punto de captaciуn. Asн, el
abordaje aquн presentado revela una experiencia de cuantificaciуn de la
necesidad del consumo del agua en la agricultura en la regiуn de
Algarve, Sur de Portugal Continental.La metodologнa contemplу anбlisis
de imбgenes orbitales de detecciуn remota a partir del Procesamiento
Digital de Imбgenes (PDI) y anбlisis en Sistema de Informaciуn
Geogrбfica (SIG). Los datos climбticos fueron obtenidos a partir de las
estaciones en la regiуn en estudio y los datos de dotaciуn de riego, por
tipo de cultivo, fueron obtenidos de los trabajos agronуmicos para la
regiуn.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O crescimento e expansгo do meio urbano ocorrem nas cidades e determinam toda a dinвmica de apropriaзгo do espaзo urbano, segundo a lуgica do capital que, na maioria das vezes й, autocrбtico e desigual. Assim, fenфmenos como a segregaзгo socioespacial ganham forзa na medida em que certas populaзхes sгo forзadas a habitar nas periferias das grandes cidades, portanto, privadas do acesso а terra, dos serviзos pъblicos e da assistкncia social. Discutir a segregaзгo socioespacial, envolve dimensхes objetivas e individuais, da qualidade de vida e da materializaзгo da realidade do cotidiano das pessoas. Essa obra tem como objetivo, fornecer mйtodos e tйcnicas da geoinformaзгo, para avaliar a qualidade de vida urbana das grandes cidades, empregando ferramentas de anбlise da questгo fundiбria, cбlculo do нndice de бrea verde por habitante bem como, de padrхes de segregaзгo socioambiental urbana. INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Orbital images are source of data for indirect quantification of water to agriculture. It?s made from
mapping the irrigated and water allotment. This methodology is normally developed by Image
Classification. Therefore, the algorithms only analyse the difference between endmembers spectral. In
Algarve region in Portugal predominant is the small farming. Thus, the identification of the irrigated area
is compromised when utilized the Classification because the pixel has many elements number inserted in
unique pixel, that result in spectral mixture the reflectance of the endmembers. For modelling the mixture
endmembers applied the Multiple Endmember Spectral Mixture Analysis by fraction image. This work is
developed for citrus, which is the more important crop. The results show that the irrigated area aren?t
exceed 2,14 kmІ in a total area of 65,08 kmІ. To check these results are executed a similar methodology
by analysing the golf camp, that the water consumes its known. Thus, identify area of 18,49 kmІ (Golf)
and consume of 77,28 millions de m3/year.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The objective of that studying was to avaliate the could and limitation of use CCD CBERS images for to
improve morphology of systems in the surveland placedown in Araguaia river medium in analyse to comparate with
the studying behind work have done and and that used TM Landsat -5 and ETM+ Lansat - 7 images. The propriety
studied and worked here was area, limits, wide, length, and water connecting. This paper have been done in the land
cover Araguaia river medium in a place for area of 2029 Km2 between Bandeirantes and Luis Alves villages. That
CBERS 2 images have shown values of morphologies as Landsat images, should to practice of morfologie in
different weight.

Com os dados obtidos й possнvel realizar o Processamento Digital de Imagens (PDI), que trata de forma especifica, da extraзгo, identificaзгo, o realce e a condensaзгo das informaзхes que se deseja para um determinado fim (Crosta, 1993).
